p.d: There is a new take on fast food, notably with the Foodchain project, where the creative team led by Chef Charles-Antoine Crete puts the focus on vegetables! And at the snack-bar Chez Tousignant, where everything is homemade by the threesome of Stefano Faita, Michele Forgione and the chef Yann Turcotte. Presented by: Jos√©e di Stasio.
